## Choose a pinned model to deploy

```{r}
library(vetiver)
library(pins)
board <- board_url(c(
  chicago_model = url <- "https://spectral-bullfinch.d01bf.fleeting.rstd.io/rsconnect/inspections-result-pin/"
))
v <- vetiver_pin_read(board, "chicago_model")
v
```

## Create artifacts to run a Dockerfile

```{r}
vetiver_prepare_docker(board,
                       #path = "docker",
                       #port = 8080,
                       "chicago_model")
```

What outputs are created?

## Build your container

```bash
docker build -t inspections .
```

## Run your container

```bash
docker run -p 8000:8000 inspections
```

## Make predictions

```{r}
## check your URL here:
endpoint <- vetiver_endpoint("http://127.0.0.1:8000/predict/")
```

With some new data:

```{r}
new_data <- tibble::tibble(
  facility_type = c("RESTAURANT", "RESTAURANT", "GROCERY STORE"),
  risk = c("RISK 3 (LOW)", "RISK 1 (HIGH)", "RISK 1 (HIGH)"),
  total_violations = 10 + c(0, 1e2, 1e3),
  inspection_date = lubridate::today() - c(0, 1e3, 1e4)
)
print(new_data)
new_data_predictions <- predict(endpoint, new_data)
new_data %>%
  bind_cols(new_data_predictions) %>%
  relocate(.pred_class) %>%
  rename(model_prediction = .pred_class)
```
